tabs.title: Administration of Medicines
tabs.content: Our qualified caregivers are proficient in managing medication schedules, ensuring the right dosage at the right time.

image.alt: a nurse holding a stethoscope against a mans chest

tabs.title: Personal Care
tabs.content: From catheter care to stoma and peg feeding, we provide discreet and compassionate assistance with personal hygiene and specialised medical needs.

image.alt: a nurse and a man smiling

tabs.title: Hoisting and Mobility Support
tabs.content: Our skilled professionals are trained in safe hoisting techniques, including track systems, to facilitate mobility and independence.

image.alt: a close up of a man in a wheelchair

tabs.title: Dementia Care
tabs.content: We have expertise in all stages of dementia, providing customised care plans to address cognitive, emotional, and physical needs.

image.alt: two women holding hands and smiling

tabs.title: Palliative Care
tabs.content: Palliative Care: Our empathetic team offers specialised care for individuals with advanced illnesses, focusing on comfort, pain management, and emotional support.

image.alt: a close up of two women holding hands

tabs.title: Disabilities and Conditions
tabs.content: QuiglyCare is experienced in supporting a wide range of disabilities and conditions, tailoring care plans to promote independence and well-being.

image.alt: a nurse performing physiotherapy on a patient

tabs.title: Food Preparation
tabs.content: We understand the importance of nutritious meals and can assist with meal planning, preparation, and special dietary needs.

image.alt: an image of vegetables on a chopping board

tabs.title: Administrative Duties
tabs.content: Our caregivers can lend a hand with administrative tasks, such as appointment scheduling, medication management, and coordination of healthcare services.

image.alt: a carer walking with an elderly patient

tabs.title: Companionship and Friendship
tabs.content: Beyond caregiving, we provide companionship and foster meaningful relationships, ensuring your loved ones have social interaction and emotional support.
